question.body: The digestive system includes the gastrointestinal tract and auxiliary organs that work together to accomplish:

multiple_choice.choice: The exchange of oxygen and carbon dioxide
The hormonal control of the body.
The intake and processing of food for use in the body.

response.feedback: Incorrect. This is the main function of the respiratory system.
Incorrect. The creation of ATP takes place at a cellular level in almost all cells of the body.
Incorrect. The hormonal control of the body is the function of the endocrine system.
Correct. The main function of the digestive system is to take in nutrients through the breakdown of food.
